long_description: Built with a race-ready carbon frame, the Diamondback Overdrive Carbon 29er Hardtail Mountain Bike delivers a fast-riding platform with a 100mm Fox 32 CTD fork and 30 speeds for trail-riding glee. Using an advanced molding process and high-grade carbon, Diamondback sculpts a world-class racing frame with flawless cross-country trail geometry. Fox 32 Float CTD Air fork has 100mm of travel that can be simply tuned between the 3 CTD settings (Climb, Trail, Descend); 15mm thru axle helps stiffen up the front. Tapered and machined 1.5 in. head tube enhances strength, rigidity and steering precision. 3x10 drivetrain features SRAM X7 and X5 components for fast, reliable gear changes. Avid Elixir 1 hydraulic disc brakes employ a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in back to facilitate powerful, responsive braking, even in steep, sloppy conditions. Diamondback SL-7 double-walled rims are wrapped with WTB Wolverine Race tires, which boast a fast-rolling center tread and aggressive shoulder tread for confident cornering. Specs on the Diamondback Overdrive Carbon 29er Hardtail Mountain Bike are subject to change.
